ThingDef.label: tox grenades mk 02
ThingDef.description: EMP Grenades are the bane of Mechanoids everywhere; they have also proven useful when a synth has a unforeseen malfunction, which as defiantly never happened. Trusted usually to Tech Marines to avoid accidental power outages. It is set to detonate in 5 seconds. These are meant to use with the Marine Pearl Tech armors.
